about_the_game:
In this visual novel comes three terrifying narrative experiences! Oh, so spooky! So scary! Whatever will you do (besides play this game)?


Take control of up to nine characters in order to navigate through five Acts of narrative gameplay and (hopefully) save your theme park from economic destruction. Via choice menus and dialogue options, help each character of the story try to better their lives. In a sort of twist on the genre, you determine who gets together with who instead of outright trying to date one of them.

  • Cassie: Doesn't want much out of life. Wants the Slaughterlands Scare Area of Vienna Gardens to somehow claw its way back to its former glory.
  • Beatrice: Will take the crown and become this season's Queen of Scary (it's a lot like Homecoming), but has to contend with her ex, Benedict, who has his own plans for the crown.
  • Caesar: A cowardly chicken sentenced to community service. Vows revenge upon the park itself, but is that really what he wants?

..... and more! Their fate is in your hands, gamers.


Your expedition into the Arctic has doomed itself. Low on food, low on sanity, and low on hope, you have but one choice..... and that is to somehow convince the local monster population not to eat you.

By dating them.

I assume that I got your attention with that one. Good. Will you sate the appeite of The Massive Kaleidoscope, or spurn their affections in favor of getting with The End Of All Things And Nations? The fate of humanity - or at least a very small portion of it - lies with your decision of waifu or husbando demon.


Last, but not least, is a big old fashioned Kaiju punching simulator! Various giant monsters are rampaging through San Francisco, and it is up to the super team known as the Geek Patrol to quell this uprising! Can they put aside their differences and stop Big Monkey before he destroys Coit Tower? Or thwart Iguana Large before they completely mess up Fisherman's Wharf? Or.... is there something far more dangerous coming? Will it take the combined forces of human and monster to stop the totally foreshadowed impending apocalypse?

Genre: Visual Novel, Narrative
Playtime: About an hour? Calculating length for games is haaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaard.

short_description: Straight from the fright factory comes three SPOOKY games in one! Date demons from the center of the planet! Save a spooky theme park! Smash some faces in as giant Kaiju!
